attributes.action: Manchester airport to scrap drop off charges at the terminals/ railway station
attributes.additional_details: The internet has many instances of absurd queues caused by the ridiculous system at the airport
attributes.background: They charge  for dropping off passengers at the terminals / rail station, no matter how short a stay  .Comprises abuse of  monopoly position and  money making exercise. traffic regulation achievable with vehicle recognition technology without charging for first 15 minutes. Charging unique to UK

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Manchester Airport, not the UK Parliament and Government. 

You can find out how to complain to Manchester Airport here:

https://www.manchesterairport.co.uk/help/contact-details/
